title: Dear summoners! (LF> OOL recruitment)
body:
Hey everyone, i am creating a team for the upcoming, event OOL tournament and would like to recruit some shensational players to strive for those juicy rewards! :P 

If you think you're capable of benefitting this team then may be consider adding me: Distal 

Conditions: {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} 

* Silver II <--> Gold or higher!
* Must be an active player!
* Must at least main a primary and secondary role!


I'll be on for most of the time so feel free to ask me any questions!!



Remember summoners, positivity is the key to victory! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: hello, just wondering if u have one of those spots still open, ill gladly play.
I have me and 3 others who are down
